name: Initial U: Bust Portrait of Jeremias de Montagnone
description: Initial U: Bust Portrait of Jeremias de Montagnone; Novella Master (Italian, active Padua, Italy 1396 - 1410); Venice, Veneto, Italy; early 15th century; Tempera colors, pen and ink, and gold leaf on parchment bound between wood boards covered with red velvet; Leaf: 36.8 x 26 cm (14 1/2 x 10 1/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIV 8, fol. 1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Initial U: Bust Portrait of Jeremias de Montagnone
medium: Tempera colors, pen and ink, and gold leaf on parchment bound between wood boards covered with red velvet
